# panos_bgp_filtering_routing_profile (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
# Create a template for BGP filtering profiles
resource "panos_template" "bgp_template" {
  location = { panorama = {} }
  name     = "bgp-filtering-template"
}

# Example 1: Basic IPv4 Unicast Filtering with Prefix Lists and Route Maps
# This example demonstrates inbound/outbound network filtering using prefix lists
# and route maps for fine-grained control over advertised and received routes.

# Create prefix lists for network filtering
resource "panos_filters_prefix_list_routing_profile" "ipv4_inbound_prefix" {
  location = {
    template = {
      name = panos_template.bgp_template.name
    }
  }

  name        = "ipv4-inbound-prefix-list"
  description = "Prefix list for incoming IPv4 routes"

  type = {
    ipv4 = {
      ipv4_entries = [
        {
          name   = "10"
          action = "permit"
          prefix = {
            entry = {
              network = "10.0.0.0/8"
            }
          }
        },
        {
          name   = "20"
          action = "deny"
          prefix = {
            entry = {
              network = "192.168.0.0/16"
            }
          }
        }
      ]
    }
  }
}

resource "panos_filters_prefix_list_routing_profile" "ipv4_outbound_prefix" {
  location = {
    template = {
      name = panos_template.bgp_template.name
    }
  }

  name        = "ipv4-outbound-prefix-list"
  description = "Prefix list for outgoing IPv4 routes"

  type = {
    ipv4 = {
      ipv4_entries = [
        {
          name   = "10"
          action = "permit"
          prefix = {
            entry = {
              network               = "172.16.0.0/12"
              greater_than_or_equal = 16
              less_than_or_equal    = 24
            }
          }
        }
      ]
    }
  }
}

# Create route maps for advanced filtering
resource "panos_filters_bgp_route_map_routing_profile" "inbound_route_map" {
  location = {
    template = {
      name = panos_template.bgp_template.name
    }
  }

  name        = "inbound-route-map"
  description = "Route map for incoming routes"

  route_map = [
    {
      name        = "10"
      action      = "permit"
      description = "Permit routes from preferred peers"
    }
  ]
}

resource "panos_filters_bgp_route_map_routing_profile" "outbound_route_map" {
  location = {
    template = {
      name = panos_template.bgp_template.name
    }
  }

  name        = "outbound-route-map"
  description = "Route map for outgoing routes"

  route_map = [
    {
      name        = "10"
      action      = "permit"
      description = "Advertise local routes"
    }
  ]
}

# BGP Filtering Profile with network filters and route maps
resource "panos_bgp_filtering_routing_profile" "ipv4_unicast_basic" {
  location = {
    template = {
      name = panos_template.bgp_template.name
    }
  }

  name        = "ipv4-unicast-basic-filtering"
  description = "Basic IPv4 unicast filtering with prefix lists and route maps"

  ipv4 = {
    unicast = {
      inbound_network_filters = {
        prefix_list = panos_filters_prefix_list_routing_profile.ipv4_inbound_prefix.name
      }
      outbound_network_filters = {
        prefix_list = panos_filters_prefix_list_routing_profile.ipv4_outbound_prefix.name
      }
      route_maps = {
        inbound  = panos_filters_bgp_route_map_routing_profile.inbound_route_map.name
        outbound = panos_filters_bgp_route_map_routing_profile.outbound_route_map.name
      }
    }
  }
}

# Example 2: IPv4 with Conditional Advertisement and AS-Path Filtering
# This example shows conditional route advertisement based on route existence
# and AS-path filtering for controlling routes based on AS number patterns.

# Create route maps for conditional advertisement
resource "panos_filters_bgp_route_map_routing_profile" "advertise_map" {
  location = {
    template = {
      name = panos_template.bgp_template.name
    }
  }

  name        = "advertise-map"
  description = "Routes to conditionally advertise"

  route_map = [
    {
      name   = "10"
      action = "permit"
    }
  ]
}

resource "panos_filters_bgp_route_map_routing_profile" "exist_map" {
  location = {
    template = {
      name = panos_template.bgp_template.name
    }
  }

  name        = "exist-map"
  description = "Routes that must exist for conditional advertisement"

  route_map = [
    {
      name   = "10"
      action = "permit"
    }
  ]
}

# Create AS-path access lists for filtering
resource "panos_filters_as_path_access_list_routing_profile" "as_path_filter" {
  location = {
    template = {
      name = panos_template.bgp_template.name
    }
  }

  name        = "as-path-filter"
  description = "Filter routes based on AS path"

  aspath_entries = [
    {
      name         = "1"
      action       = "permit"
      aspath_regex = "^65000_"
    },
    {
      name         = "2"
      action       = "deny"
      aspath_regex = "_65001$"
    }
  ]
}

# Create route map for unsuppressing routes
resource "panos_filters_bgp_route_map_routing_profile" "unsuppress_map" {
  location = {
    template = {
      name = panos_template.bgp_template.name
    }
  }

  name        = "unsuppress-map"
  description = "Routes to unsuppress"

  route_map = [
    {
      name   = "10"
      action = "permit"
    }
  ]
}

# BGP Filtering Profile with conditional advertisement
resource "panos_bgp_filtering_routing_profile" "ipv4_conditional_adv" {
  location = {
    template = {
      name = panos_template.bgp_template.name
    }
  }

  name        = "ipv4-conditional-advertisement"
  description = "IPv4 filtering with conditional advertisement and AS-path filtering"

  ipv4 = {
    unicast = {
      conditional_advertisement = {
        exist = {
          advertise_map = panos_filters_bgp_route_map_routing_profile.advertise_map.name
          exist_map     = panos_filters_bgp_route_map_routing_profile.exist_map.name
        }
      }
      filter_list = {
        inbound = panos_filters_as_path_access_list_routing_profile.as_path_filter.name
      }
      unsuppress_map = panos_filters_bgp_route_map_routing_profile.unsuppress_map.name
    }
  }
}

# Example 3: IPv6 Unicast Filtering with Access Lists
# This example demonstrates IPv6 filtering using access lists (distribute lists)
# instead of prefix lists for network-based filtering.

# Create IPv6 access lists
resource "panos_filters_access_list_routing_profile" "ipv6_inbound_acl" {
  location = {
    template = {
      name = panos_template.bgp_template.name
    }
  }

  name        = "ipv6-inbound-acl"
  description = "Access list for incoming IPv6 routes"

  type = {
    ipv6 = {
      ipv6_entries = [
        {
          name   = "10"
          action = "permit"
        }
      ]
    }
  }
}

resource "panos_filters_access_list_routing_profile" "ipv6_outbound_acl" {
  location = {
    template = {
      name = panos_template.bgp_template.name
    }
  }

  name        = "ipv6-outbound-acl"
  description = "Access list for outgoing IPv6 routes"

  type = {
    ipv6 = {
      ipv6_entries = [
        {
          name   = "10"
          action = "permit"
        },
        {
          name   = "20"
          action = "deny"
        }
      ]
    }
  }
}

# Create AS-path access list for IPv6 (AS-path filters work for both IPv4 and IPv6)
resource "panos_filters_as_path_access_list_routing_profile" "ipv6_as_path" {
  location = {
    template = {
      name = panos_template.bgp_template.name
    }
  }

  name        = "ipv6-as-path-filter"
  description = "AS-path filter for IPv6 routes"

  aspath_entries = [
    {
      name         = "1"
      action       = "permit"
      aspath_regex = "^64[0-9]{3}_"
    }
  ]
}

# BGP Filtering Profile for IPv6
resource "panos_bgp_filtering_routing_profile" "ipv6_unicast_filtering" {
  location = {
    template = {
      name = panos_template.bgp_template.name
    }
  }

  name        = "ipv6-unicast-filtering"
  description = "IPv6 unicast filtering with access lists and AS-path filtering"

  ipv6 = {
    unicast = {
      inbound_network_filters = {
        distribute_list = panos_filters_access_list_routing_profile.ipv6_inbound_acl.name
      }
      outbound_network_filters = {
        distribute_list = panos_filters_access_list_routing_profile.ipv6_outbound_acl.name
      }
      filter_list = {
        inbound  = panos_filters_as_path_access_list_routing_profile.ipv6_as_path.name
        outbound = panos_filters_as_path_access_list_routing_profile.ipv6_as_path.name
      }
    }
  }
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `location` (Attributes) The location of this object. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--location))
- `name` (String)

### Optional

- `description` (String) Describe BGP Filtering Profile
- `ipv4` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--ipv4))
- `ipv6` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--ipv6))

Optional:

- `ngfw` (Attributes) Located in a specific NGFW device (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--location--ngfw))
- `template` (Attributes) Located in a specific template (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--location--template))
- `template_stack` (Attributes) Located in a specific template stack (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--location--template_stack))

Optional:

- `ngfw_device` (String) The NGFW device

Optional:

- `name` (String) Specific Panorama template
- `ngfw_device` (String) The NGFW device
- `panorama_device` (String) Specific Panorama device

### Nested Schema for `ipv4.multicast.conditional_advertisement.exist`

Optional:

- `advertise_map` (String) Specify Route-Map match criteria to advertise routes
- `exist_map` (String) Specify Route-Map to Match existing routes in BGP local-rib

### Nested Schema for `ipv4.multicast.conditional_advertisement.non_exist`

Optional:

- `advertise_map` (String) Specify Route-Map match criteria to advertise routes
- `non_exist_map` (String) Specify Route-Map to match non-existing routes in BGP local-rib
